mapper.select: SELECT i.indicator_id, i.date, i.tariff_per_date, i.value, i.is_paid, i.is_published, wm.water_meter_id, wm.name, wm.description, wm.tariff FROM indicator i LEFT OUTER JOIN watermeter wm on i.water_meter_id = wm.water_meter_id WHERE indicator_id = #{indicatorId}

SELECT i.indicator_id, i.date, i.tariff_per_date, i.value, i.is_paid, i.is_published, wm.water_meter_id, wm.name, wm.description, wm.tariff FROM indicator i LEFT OUTER JOIN watermeter wm on i.water_meter_id = wm.water_meter_id WHERE i.date BETWEEN parsedatetime(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AND parsedatetime(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AND i.water_meter_id = #{waterMeterId} ORDER BY i.date ASC

SELECT i.indicator_id, i.date, i.tariff_per_date, i.value, i.is_paid, i.is_published, wm.water_meter_id, wm.name, wm.description FROM indicator i LEFT OUTER JOIN watermeter wm on i.water_meter_id = wm.water_meter_id

SELECT i.indicator_id, i.date, i.tariff_per_date, i.value, i.is_paid, i.is_published, wm.water_meter_id, wm.name, wm.description, wm.tariff FROM indicator i LEFT JOIN watermeter wm on i.water_meter_id = wm.water_meter_id WHERE wm.water_meter_id = #{waterMeterId} ORDER BY i.date ASC

SELECT i.indicator_id, i.date, i.tariff_per_date, i.value, i.is_paid, i.is_published, wm.water_meter_id, wm.name, wm.description, wm.tariff FROM indicator i LEFT OUTER JOIN watermeter wm on wm.water_meter_id = i.water_meter_id LEFT OUTER JOIN address a on wm.address_id = a.address_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY i.date DESC LIMIT #{number}
